name: InterestingfactsaboutIndia
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: facts of india
des: Did you know that India - the land of snake charmers and holy saints used to be an island more than 100 million years ago? About 50 million years ago, it collided with the Asian continent and thus was born the Himalayas. Fascinating, isn't it? With over a billion people from all kinds of religions and ethnicities, India is not only the second most populated country, but it also has in store some mind-blowing facts and achievements under its belt. Explore some of those facts using this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
